column118: ,"We have a custom for choosing the king:"" she said, ""We have a falcon bird.  We release it and on whoever’s shoulder it sits, he becomes the king.""",~~~,ML ID,folktale. Retold from written source,The Sea Princess,pro-n:(CASE)
